Reviews.Title: “Very clean, in front of a metro stop, very close to citycenter, cheap, what else?”
Reviews.Author: LestatDeLioncourt
Reviews.Content: doesnt look hostel basic hotel location east berlin metro stop located walkable distance alexander platz shops staff willing help issue breakfast included 4 euros eat buffet besides milk cereals jam ham cheese eggs free wifi lobby price excellent private 4 beds bathroom ensuite 15 euros person reccommended

Reviews.Title: “Not really a hostel, more like a basic, but very clean, hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: bobdibest
Reviews.Content: stayed friends month hostel werent expect hostel clean beds comfortable guests arent backpacker type kids teenagers middle aged travellers parties staying guest kitchen basement indication hotel location metro stops alexanderplatz train station opposite hotel convenient little food jewelery market road weekend mornings heart east berlins bars clubs restaurant district comes alive night highly recommended sadly pictures modern decor interior

Reviews.Title: “Impressive Construction”
Reviews.Author: TravelingL
Reviews.Content: hostel sbahn station block 5 minutes brand stayed 2008 impressed cleanliness precise construction building hostels design suits purpose lobby lounge draws mention spotless breakfast hostel europe nearby supermarket sooo convenient

HotelInfo.Name: Meininger City Hostel & Hotel Senefelder Platz
HotelInfo.Address: Schoenhauser Allee 19, 10435 Berlin, Germany
